repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:19.04

RUN apt-get update \
 && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ca-certificates \
                       curl \
                       git \
                       make && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN curl -f -L https://github.com/CraneStation/wasi-sdk/releases/download/wasi-sdk-4/wasi-sdk-4.0-linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar xz --strip-components=1 -C /

VOLUME /code
WORKDIR /code
CMD make
